description:
Invisibility comes with a price; a demon repays a kindness, and always carries some Yaki-Gobou when you die.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tengu no Kakuremino / Onibaba-san ga Nakoudo / Enma-sama wa Hachigoro-don
The Tengu`s Cloak / Grannie Demon Is My Matchmaker / King Enma Is Hachigoro-don
天狗の隠れみの / 鬼婆さんが仲人 / 閻魔さまはハチゴロどん
